name: Soulstix: Move to the Groove!
description:
A rhythm platformer starring Comet, a girl trapped in a virtual ruins who must daringly dance through spikes, saws, and punching bags with her wits and teleportation powers for absolutely no reason whatsoever.

This shit is fun - Beta tester

For PIGSquad's July Summer Slow Jam: Music-First. (7/10/20 - 7/26/20)

Created by Ben Kurtin, Teagan Messenger-Nyborg, and Cityfires.

Known Bugs:

  • None for now!

Please report any issues in the comments.
